com.locuslabs.sdk.maps.model

Class UserPositionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.locuslabs.sdk.maps.model.UserPositionManager

  • public class UserPositionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Track a user's position There are two orthogonal groups of settings: - venues for which you would like tracking to happen - listeners for changes to the user's position A listener will receive OnPositionChanged events for *any* registered venue (though, since the user is presumably only in one venue at a time, only one venue will fire OnPositionChanged events at a time) registerVenue: register a Venue to receive OnPositionChanged events removeVenue: stop a Venue from receiving OnPositionChanged events registerOnPositionChangedListener: register a listener for OnPositionChanged events removeOnPositionChangedListener: unregister a listener for OnPositionChanged events

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  UserPositionManager.OnClosestBeaconChangedListener
      Listener to receive asynchronous UserPositionManager.onClosestBeacon calls onClosestBeacon will be called when the UserPositionManager detects a new closest beacon
      static interface  UserPositionManager.OnPositionChangedListener
      Listener to receive asynchronous UserPositionManager.onPositionChanged calls onPositionChanged will be called when the UserPositionManager detects that the user's position has changed
      static interface  UserPositionManager.OnPositionStateChangedListener
